text: Abdul Maliki was born in 1914 and died in 1969. He was born in Nigeria and grow up to become a politician. ==Education== Maliki started his primary education at Okene elementary school in 1923, but finished in Bida Primary School in 1927 and later went to Teachers Training College Katsina in 1929. He went to England for local government training program. ==Career== Abdul Maliki, started his teaching job in Okene middle school in 1935. Later in 1936 he was promoted to become the suppervisor for works in Okene untill 1939. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:1969 deaths Category:Nigerian politicians
title: Abdul Maliki
